title: Ocean and San Solution Two Cargo Bibs Spring Pre-Order
content:
Ocean and San, makers of hybrid casual cycling apparel, just announced its pre-order for the spring 2025 stock of its popular Solution Two Cargo Bibs ($255). This year’s offerings are pummice (tan), jade (green), and black. The second iteration of Ocean and San’s original Solution Bib, the Solution Two features a high density elastic interface chamois and a zippered cargo pocket to keep your riding essentials secure. These pre-orders ship March 1st.

Check out more at Ocean and San.

The post Ocean and San Solution Two Cargo Bibs Spring Pre-Order appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
